channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Bridge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Bridge

item.title: CVE-2021-20435|2024-08-03T17:37:24.397Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge 1.0.5.0 does not properly validate a certificate which could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196355.

item.title: CVE-2021-20441|2024-08-03T17:37:24.200Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 196617.

item.title: CVE-2021-20434|2024-08-03T17:37:24.148Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge 1.0.5.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 196346.

item.title: CVE-2021-20442|2024-08-03T17:37:24.247Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 196618.
